title: Emotional Soundtrack Music Pack Vol.3
description: A collection of 14 Emotional Soundtrack Music tracks.
longDescription:
Did you know this pack is also included in our Ultimate Cinematic Music Bundle which include all of Epikton's tracks for better value?



  Any emotional game scene can be reflected drastically differently by the music choice alone. This track is thoughtfully composed to reveal and enhance the core emotion without losing its essence. Let your audience feel the difference.




 Potential use cases; video game soundtrack, background music for games, and emotional scenes.




 Ideal for the passionate game developers, film, tv shows, documentary producers, and video editors, who need a cinematic sad soundtrack for their projects.



You can listen to the preview of the tracks here:

  • Epikton - A Curious Mind 1:30
  • Epikton - A Moment Of Silence 1:42
  • Epikton - A Peaceful World 0:53
  • Epikton - A Pessimist 0:53
  • Epikton - Appearance Of Life 2:48
  • Epikton - Brief History 2:48
  • Epikton - Carrying The Burden 2:45
  • Epikton - Fairy Tale 1:01
  • Epikton - Kindhearted 1:28
  • Epikton - Lost in the Darkness 4:45
  • Epikton - Morning Star 1:15
  • Epikton - Once Upon a Time 2:08
  • Epikton - Rain 2:03
  • Epikton - Years Of Memories 2:32
